section2.heading: Get a Free, Personalized Quote for Your Industrial Lubrication Needs with Restoreplus

list.title: Reduce Expenses:
list.content: Find specialty lubricants that minimize wear

list.title: Increase Productivity:
list.content: Get expert advice to ensure smooth operations and increased productivity.

list.title: Simplify Sourcing:
list.content: Get competitive quotes instantly from multiple trusted suppliers.

list.title: No obligation:
list.content: Explore the options and get expert advice without any commitment.

list.title: Inner peace:
list.content: Rely on our industry expertise and secure payment terms for hassle-free transactions.

section3.heading: Your One Stop for Industrial Lubrication

list.title: High performance greases for various applications:
list.content: Keep your machines running smoothly with our selection of greases formulated for harsh industrial environments.

list.title: Extend equipment life and minimize downtime:
list.content: Explore a wide range of greases for bearings, gears and other critical components.

list.title: Industrial cleaning and protection solutions:
list.content: Keep equipment performance at peak level with our high-quality pastes for cleaning, protecting and sealing.

list.title: Industry-specific chemical solutions for your operation:
list.content: Optimize your industrial processes with our comprehensive range of chemical products.

list.title: Convenient spray lubricants for easy application:
list.content: Maintain your equipment efficiently with our selection of lubricants in convenient spray formats.

list.title: High-performance industrial oils for optimum lubrication:
list.content: Keep your machines running smoothly with our wide range of high-quality oils.

section4.heading: Find the perfect fit: Explore our comprehensive range of lubricants.

section6.heading: For industry.
section6.about: We have been strengthening industrial efficiency and maximizing productivity for over 10 years.

contactPage.title: Contact Restoreplus for a solution to reach more buyers and grow your business.
contactPage.text: Tell us about your industrial business goals and we'll be in touch with recommendations on how to meet them.
contactPage.aggreeForm: By submitting this form, you agree to share your contact information with Thomas.

sideInfo.text: The industry expertise and products at Thomas are unmatched. Thomas helped us align our profile to our service offerings and immediately we received inquiries and quotes, helping us win an extremely large project. Working with Thomas is a game changer.
sideInfo.author: Hasan Kara

hero.title: We Power the Growth of North American Manufacturing
hero.description: For over 125+ years, Thomas has served as North America’s number one industrial sourcing platform and marketing powerhouse. We serve professionals on both sides of the industrial buying process to create solutions that inform, support, and empower industry.

section1.title: Save Time Sourcing on Thomas
section1.description: Thomasnet.com® is trusted by millions of industrial buyers who have leveraged our content and expertise since 1898. We connect buyers, engineers, and MRO professionals to over 500,000 North American manufacturers daily. We have a dedicated team of specialists who ensure you always have vetted and up-to-date company information to get your job done faster.

list.text: Filter your search by location, company type, diversity status, certifications, & more
Send RFQs to multiple suppliers with one click

section2.title: Grow Your Business with Thomas
section2.description: Thomas is the number one advertising platform and digital marketing service provider for manufacturing businesses looking to reach highly-qualified procurement professionals and engineers and grow their business. Our product and service suite is designed to help our partners attract, convert, and retain customers in the industrial space.
section2.listTitle: Start earning new business today with:

list.text: Website Design & Development & Search Engine Optimization

section3.title: Work at Thomas
section3.description: At Thomas, our guiding principles are illustrated through every action we take and every relationship we foster. Whatever the job title, Thomas is a team of people helping others do their jobs, advance their careers, and grow their businesses in the digital industrial economy. Working at Thomas means joining an enduring, focused, guiding, and approachable team that has been a trusted resource for our marketplace for over 120 years.

list.text: Commit to driving the future of the manufacturing and industrial space
Guide the industry with information, ideas, and solutions they need to thrive
Drive decisions using data and insights to support our customers, users, and each other

rightCard.text: Connect with the most active and qualified network of B2B buyers on the world's leading platform for product discovery and supplier selection.

meta.title: Restoreplus Industrial Lubricants | Find the Right Oil for Every Machine
meta.description: Discover Restoreplus' complete line of high-performance industrial lubricants. Easily filter by sector, category, or equivalent brand to find the perfect oil for your needs. Powerful search & filter options included.
